title: Face Cover for a Horse
description: diagonal square with eye holes; overall embroidery has circles with metal mirror centers; red pompoms on main body and at ends of white shell-like tassels attached to all sides of main body with glass bead holders; small diagonal square on nose end; red twisted ties at sides and on nose piece; black, gold, green, purple, red and white embroidery
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
